Name: Skate Forever
About the game: Skate Forever is a classic 2D runner with a side view. You control a boy skater who is just in love with this sport. Test your reaction, make the skater jump in time and overcome obstacles and enemies. On the levels you can find special perks that change the gameplay, for example, speeding up the character, or you can take an anti-gravity skate, turn upside down.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Skate Forever? Check out the release date (Oct 6, 2020), developer insights from Reforged Group, and a complete game summary.
